text: Secondhand Serenade is an American acoustic rock solo project started by John Vesely. Vesely is the singer, guitarist and pianist. Secondhand Serenade is most famous for the song "Fall for You". This song was in the top 40 for many charts. ==Discography== ===Studio albums=== Year Album details 2005 Awake * Release date: October 27, 2005 * Label: Independent 2008 A Twist in My Story * Release date: February 19, 2008 * Label: Glassnote Records 2010 Hear Me Now * Release date: August 3, 2010 * Label: Glassnote Records 2014 Undefeated * Release date: October 27, 2014 * Label: Independent ==References== Category:American rock bands Category:Emo bands Category:Indie rock bands Category:Musical groups from California Category:Menlo Park, California
title: Secondhand Serenade
